comments:
Build ID: M20060921-0945

Steps To Reproduce:
Some pages of the Eclipse online help fail to display, with French locale. For example, this page:
http://127.0.0.1:52614/help/index.jsp?topic=/org.eclipse.platform.doc.user/gettingStarted/qs-24a.xhtml

Here is the exception displayed in the browser frame:

Le g?n?rateur de contenu de ce document a rencontr? une erreur interne lors du traitement du document.
